sentences.sentence: Write an acrostic love note or poem.
sentences.translation: 用离合诗体形式写几句充满爱意的话或一首小诗。

sentences.sentence: This is the only chapter that is not an acrostic.
sentences.translation: 这是唯一的不是离合的一章。

sentences.sentence: Make an acrostic poem using one of your spelling words.
sentences.translation: 使用你的拼写词汇创作一首打游诗。
